titleStmt.title: The devil's an asse: or, the policy of hell made plain to the dwellers on earth Being a serious reflection upon the late inhumane rebellious warr. Wherein is laid open the folly as well as wickednesse of that horrid sin of rebellion. By T.B.
titleStmt.author: T. B.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
